cause.description:
On Januaury 19th 2005 I lost my father to Lung Cancer & I never want to see anyone go through what he went through!!!! He was 46 years old with 3 children who loved and adored him. Don't let what happen to my father happen to anyone you love!!!!!
1. Lung Cancer can be prevented don't let it take your life!!!
cause.mission: Inform people about the dangers of smoking and the risk of Lung Cancer
cause.name: Lung Cancer Awareness
